input.sentences: an important part of the summer is taking a trip to the local theme park .
the thrill of letting yourself dive | twist and turn on rides makes us feel more alive .
the people who are waiting their turn see the excitement in the eyes of the riders adding to their anticipation .
while on a ride a person has complete ability to let go and enjoy the moment .
the look on the faces will always be the lasting impression of how successful a summer trip to the park was .
output.sentences: This summer we ended up taking a trip to the theme park.
You twist and turn everyway you can possibly imagine on these thrill rides.
The worst part of any theme park for most people is waiting in line for the other riders to finish.
There wasn't a person there who would say their day was ruined by waiting in line for a ride because the moment you get to ride makes it all worth it.
Overall I'd say our summer trip was very successful.
